# FaustaoInvader
----------------
## Description
-----------
## Installation
### Install prerequisites
```shell
sudo python3 python3-pip git
pip3 install pygame
```
### Clone repository
```shell
git clone https://github.com/tiagotvrs/FaustaoInvader.git
```
-----
## Run and shot Faust√£o!
```shell
cd FaustaoInvader
python3 faustaoinvader.py
```
